caption:
Free Water Park Access for Disney Resort Guests Starts Summer 2025

Starting May 21, 2025, Disney Resort guests can enjoy free water park admission on their arrival day. Choose between Typhoon Lagoon or Blizzard Beach—both parks will be open this summer for the first time since 2019.

From May 21 through September 7, all six Disney World parks (4 theme parks + 2 water parks) will be open at the same time.

Blizzard Beach will be temporarily closed from May 1–20 to prepare for the season.

Get ready for slides, lazy rivers, and summer fun—all included with your Disney Resort stay!

#DisneyWaterParks #WaltDisneyWorld #SummerAtDisney  #disneyvacation #disneyparks
